Subclasses of SMTPException in me.normanmaurer.niosmtp
 class SMTPConnectionException
          SMTPException which will get thrown if the connection was timed out or refused
 class SMTPIdleException
          SMTPException which will get thrown if the connection did idle for to long.
 class SMTPUnsupportedExtensionException
          SMTPException sub-class which will get thrown if the client does not support the needed EXTENSION
